titleStmt.title: The most rare and excellent history of the Dutchesse of Suffolkes calamity. To the tune of Queene Dido.
Strange histories. Duchess of Suffolk's calamity.
titleStmt.author: Deloney, Thomas, 1543?-1600.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Wright dwelling at Christ Church gate.,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Deloney by STC.
Verse: "VVhen God had taken for our sinne ..."
In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
